text: "Someone Somewhere Tonight" is a song by American singer Kellie Pickler. ==Music video== The music video for "Someone Somewhere Tonight" was directed by Roman White and premiered on CMT on July 9, 2013. The video debuted at number 20 on CMT's CMT Hot 20 Countdown for the week of August 17, 2013. ==References== Category:2013 songs Category:Kellie Pickler songs
title: Someone Somewhere Tonight
